item.title: Big Data needs Identity in order to Act
item.description: At the 2015 Identity Summit Scott McNeely declared “Big data without Identity is not actionable” Let’s discuss. Pulling from Information Week and IBM the Top 6 use cases of Big Data are: 1. Big Data Exploration 2. 360 degree view of customer 3. Information Security and Intelligence 4. Operation Analysis of data from Internet of Things 5. Data warehouse Augmentation/Optimization 6. Big Data Efficiency play (break down silos) Big Data use case
